name: open-terminal-here
title: Open Terminal Here
description: A basic utility to open a terminal window at the current Finder location
author: stephen_sanders

commands.name: open-in-terminal
commands.title: Finder Window to Terminal
commands.description: Open the Front Finder Window in Terminal

commands.name: open-in-iterm
commands.title: Finder Window to iTerm
commands.description: Open the Front Finder Window in iTerm

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
